metadata.title: Safavieh Home Collection Palladian Mirror
features: This mirror features a grey finish
Perfect for use as an accent; focal point of your room; or as a functional mirror
Perfect for the living room; den; hallway; bedroom; or anywhere you want to add modern style
description: With all the classic elegance of its namesake architectural style, the grey Palladian mirror by Safavieh is a timeless treasure. Crafted with glass inset in its mango wood frame, this traditional design evokes the look of an arched window.
